Name: The Sorrow for the Girl
Notes: This is the very first composition by Ljubica Maric, which she wrote during her studies with Josip Slavenski in Belgrade. For this composition she used the folk lyrics and composed the melody in the style of traditional folk music from the Balkans, but her harmonies are complex with some postimpressionistic colours.
